00005 #include <windows.h>
00006 #include "types.h"
00007 #include "himage.h"
00008 #include "Quantize.h"
00009 #include "Quantize Wrap.h"
00010 #include "phys math.h"
00011 
00012 typedef struct
00013 {
00014       UINT8 r;
00015       UINT8 g;
00016       UINT8 b;
00017 
00018 } RGBValues;
00019 
00020 
00021 BOOLEAN     QuantizeImage( UINT8 *pDest, UINT8 *pSrc, INT16 sWidth, INT16 sHeight, SGPPaletteEntry *pPalette )
00022 {
00023       INT16       sNumColors;
00024 
00025       // FIRST CREATE PALETTE
00026       CQuantizer        q( 255, 6 );
00027 
00028       q.ProcessImage( pSrc, sWidth, sHeight );
00029 
00030       sNumColors = q.GetColorCount();
00031 
00032       memset( pPalette, 0,  sizeof( SGPPaletteEntry ) * 256 );
00033 
00034       q.GetColorTable( (RGBQUAD*)pPalette );
00035 
00036       // THEN MAP IMAGE TO PALETTE
00037       // OK, MAPIT!
00038       MapPalette( pDest, pSrc, sWidth, sHeight, sNumColors, pPalette );
00039 
00040       return( TRUE );
00041 }
00042 
00043 
00044 void MapPalette( UINT8 *pDest, UINT8 *pSrc, INT16 sWidth, INT16 sHeight, INT16 sNumColors, SGPPaletteEntry *pTable )
00045 {
00046       INT32 cX, cY, cnt, bBest;
00047       real                          dLowestDist;
00048       real                          dCubeDist;
00049       vector_3                vTableVal, vSrcVal, vDiffVal;
00050       UINT8                         *pData;
00051       RGBValues               *pRGBData;
00052 
00053       pRGBData = (RGBValues*)pSrc;
00054 
00055       for ( cX = 0; cX < sWidth; cX++ )
00056       {
00057             for ( cY = 0; cY < sHeight; cY++ )
00058             {
00059                         // OK, FOR EACH PALETTE ENTRY, FIND CLOSEST
00060                         bBest                         = 0;
00061                         dLowestDist       = (float)9999999;
00062                         pData                         = &(pSrc[ ( cY * sWidth ) + cX ]);
00063 
00064                         for ( cnt = 0; cnt < sNumColors; cnt++ )
00065                         {
00066                               vSrcVal.x         = pRGBData[ ( cY * sWidth ) + cX ].r;
00067                               vSrcVal.y         = pRGBData[ ( cY * sWidth ) + cX ].g;
00068                               vSrcVal.z         = pRGBData[ ( cY * sWidth ) + cX ].b;
00069 
00070                               vTableVal.x = pTable[ cnt ].peRed;
00071                               vTableVal.y = pTable[ cnt ].peGreen;
00072                               vTableVal.z = pTable[ cnt ].peBlue;
00073 
00074                               // Get Dist
00075                               vDiffVal = VSubtract( &vSrcVal, &vTableVal );
00076 
00077                               // Get mag dist
00078                               dCubeDist = VGetLength( &(vDiffVal) );
00079 
00080                               if ( dCubeDist < dLowestDist )
00081                               {
00082                                     dLowestDist = dCubeDist;
00083                                     bBest = cnt;
00084                               }                             
00085                         }
00086 
00087                         // Now we have the lowest value
00088                         // Set into dest
00089                         pData = &(pDest[ ( cY * sWidth ) + cX ]);
00090 
00091                         //Set!
00092                         *pData = (UINT8)bBest;
00093             }
00094       }
00095 
00096 }
